      • requestPermissions

        public static void requestPermissions(android.app.Activity context,
                                      java.lang.String[] permissions,
                                      boolean askIfDenied,
                                      com.inlocomedia.android.core.permissions.PermissionsListener listener)
        If necessary, creates a new activity to request the user for the permissions, and alert the listener on completion.
        Parameters:
        context - An Android context
        permissions - Set of permissions to be granted
        askIfDenied - whether the user should be asked again if the permission has been previously denied
        listener - Listener that will receive a HashMap with the permissions, whether they were granted or not and if their status has changed; In case of errors, an empty hashmap will be returned.

      • givePrivacyConsent

        public static void givePrivacyConsent(android.content.Context context,
                                      boolean consent)
        Give user privacy consent
        Parameters:
        consent - true if user has given privacy consent, false otherwise

      • hasGivenPrivacyConsent

        public static boolean hasGivenPrivacyConsent(android.content.Context context)
        Checks whether the user has given privacy consent
        Returns:
        true if enabled, false otherwise

      • isWaitingUserPrivacyConsent

        public static boolean isWaitingUserPrivacyConsent(android.content.Context context)
        Checks if the SDK is waiting for the user privacy consent to be set
        Returns:
        true if the method InLocoEngagement.givePrivacyConsent() has not been called yet - neither to give or deny the consent, false otherwise
